name: Cher Grunwell
text: We üíû Hungry Howie's Pizza. One of our 2 favorite places to get pizza the way we like it. Fast, courteous service helps keep us coming back. Keep up the good work Hungry Howie's!! We'll be back. üåû Dave & Cher

text: I love the way they make their pizzas and they have really good flavored crusts as well. They have calzones and salads. They also have hot wings. If you want they have cinnamon bread for dessert.

text: Haven't eaten all day ordered a pizza from there. When I got there heard the girl at the register say "Go Away" acting like she was joking. If I wasn't hungry I'd tell her to take the pizza and shove it up where the sun don't shine, and demand my money back. Also got the pizza it was never cut. Never Again!
